name: Firecalc
tagline: A collaborative spreadsheet editor based on Firebase and SocialCalc
body:
### Welcome to Firecalc
This is the first collaborative spreadsheet editor based on Firebase and SocialCalc, which requires no special backend.

Work in progress: I'll tell your more soon!

### Authors and Contributors
This work is based on SocialCalc, Ethercalc and @mikelehen work on Firepad (Firebase-Adapter, Clients and Project structure have been totally inspired from Mike work). Firecalc was built by Clément Wehrung (@iclems), inspired by Michael Lehenbauer's work on Firepad (@mikelehen) and Ethercalc.

### Contact
Clément Wehrung / @iclems
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
